name: The Castle Of Diavolul - The Flame Of Dumnezeu
name_original: The Castle Of Diavolul - The Flame Of Dumnezeu
description: After the initial fall of the Count, the land had returned to the way it was before the darkness arrived. A year has passed, and the castle is laying in ruins on the plot of land upon which it was built. There were those whispers of seeing that the Count had returned. In the wild, it is said that a cult resides in resurrecting the Count. Will you be able to prevent evil from reigning once more? You are October Crow, the last of the nobles, the last true hero throughout these lands.
